title: Drawing, "Valley Landscape with Snow Capped Peaks, Bernese Alps, Switzerland, Part 2", September 1, 1868
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray-blue paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at center left:  green; again, at center right:  blue / beautiful rich golden brown light / light / grey; again, at lower center:  Profound; and again, at bottom right:  Sept 1st / / 68 Two parts E
description: Vertical view of the right half of a steep valley leading toward a snow capped peak in the distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Valley Landscape with Snow Capped Peaks, Bernese Alps, Switzerland, Part 2", September 1, 1868.
September 1, 1868. Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray-blue paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-269-b.
